title: Hydrothermal metal recovery of metal-contaminated wastewater with forest residue: A zero waste discharge process
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00229F, Paper
Pankaj Kumar, Sivamohan N. Reddy
Hydrothermal technology emerges as a cutting-edge approach for utilizing liquid effluent and waste biomass into valuable products. The simulated zinc metal effluent (Zn-1758 ppm) and real zinc electroplating effluent (Zn-765...
